# Summary
- What changed and why.

## Scope
- Affected areas (docs, models, controllers, services, tests).

## Evidence
- Tests run and results (commands and output).

## Checklist
- [ ] Conventional Commit used
- [ ] Tests run locally (or not applicable)
- [ ] Lint/rubocop run (or not applicable)
- [ ] Docs updated if behavior changed
- [ ] No secrets or tokens added
